column1: It was a fox. How he did run when he saw us! We ran after him
column2: and chased him into a pile of rails
column3: in one corner of the camp.You see
column4: the soldiers had torn down all the fences
column5: and piled them up for fire-wood. The fox ran right in among the rails; and
column6: the more he tried to get out

column18: and he was a prisoner. We got one of the tent-ropes and tried to tie him.
